content.description:
Tu1 regere imperio populos, Romane, memento 
(hae tibi erunt artes), pacique imponere morem,
parcere subiectissubicio, -ere, -ieci, -iectum: to subdue et debellaredebello, -are = vinco, -ere superbos.
 1:refers to Aeneas↩
content.question: As new people were incorporated into the Roman Empire, to which of the following people would the rights to a fair trial, to vote, and to hold public office be given?

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
